newsitem.title: CHINA: HK provisional legislature elects pro-China Fan boss.
newsitem.headline: HK provisional legislature elects pro-China Fan boss.

text.p: A controversial provisional legislature, set up to make laws in Hong Kong after its reversion to China this year, elected pro-Beijing politician Rita Fan as its president on Saturday.

Fan collected 33 of the votes from the 60-member body meeting in the Chinese city of Shenzhen, while her only rival Andrew Wong, incumbent president of Hong Kong's current elected Legislative Council, scored 27.

The meeting, observed by journalists via closed circuit television, took place amid a rift between China and outgoing colonial power, Britain, over Bejing's plans to roll back civil liberties in Hong Kong after the handover on July 1.
